HOW TO USE:
=============

1. EXTRACT THE FONT-AWESOME FOLDER
2. LINK THE STYLE SHEET NAME 'all.css' YOUR HTML DOCUMENT.

E.G 
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="font-awesome-5.8.2/css/all.css">

AND THAT'S ALL. YOU CAN NOW USE FONT AWESOME LOCALLY!




IMPORTANT
============

DO NOT DELETE THE 'webfonts' FOLDER
